Package esc.baylor.edu.groupProject.Objects

Class Transaction

java.lang.Object
esc.baylor.edu.groupProject.Objects.Transaction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Each transaction object represents the information for a single unique transaction
Author:
Trae
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Transaction

      public Transaction​(Types type, int recur)
      Constructs a Transaction of the given type with the given recursion period
      Parameters:
      type - A Transaction Type. Either expense or Income
      recur - Recursion period in days. -1 if no recursion

  • Method Details

      public Types getType()
      Gets the type of Transaction
      Returns:
      The Type of the Associated Transaction. Either Expense or Income

      public int getRecur()
      Gets the rate of recurrence for a Transactions
      Returns:
      How often the Transaction recurs in days

    • setRecur

      public void setRecur​(int recur)
      Changes the recursion period to the newly given value
      Parameters:
      recur - Recursion period in days

    • isRecurring

      public boolean isRecurring()
      Checks if a Transaction recurs
      Returns:
      True if the Transaction recurs; false otherwise
